actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-982.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6413, a bill to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6413 (NASA funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6413, a bill to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management, and for other purposes.
